title: I didn't get a point for Ocean Week!

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Played a normal 5v5 yesterday as {{champion:104}}, and won it. But I didn't get a point and in turn I didn't get the 4-win IP boost.

Now, I don't care that much that I didn't get the boost. Just wondering why I didn't get a point.
Is it a bug? Did I do something wrong?

I also linked my LoL account though lolking, so feel free to have a look yourselves
(Probably should of won more than one game yesterday, just to make sure :3)

replies.body:
Well, its all worked out now. Logged on today and I have the Boost.
Riot must of been a bit slow at rolling out the boosts.

I'll have to be more patient next time something like this happens before I start running to the Boards screaming **Help!** 
:3 hehe

I couldn't log in that day to get the point.

RIP
same deal with me, it does say to wait up to a couple of days. Hopefully it gets sorted
